Uses of Interface
org.bitcoinj.net.ClientConnectionManager

  • Packages that use ClientConnectionManager 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.core
    The core package contains classes for network messages like Block and Transaction, peer connectivity via PeerGroup, and block chain management.
    org.bitcoinj.net
    Classes handling low level network management using either NIO (async io) or older style blocking sockets (useful for using SOCKS proxies, Tor, SSL etc).

    • Uses of ClientConnectionManager in org.bitcoinj.core

      Constructors in org.bitcoinj.core with parameters of type ClientConnectionManager 
      Constructor and Description
      PeerGroup(Context context, AbstractBlockChain chain, ClientConnectionManager connectionManager)
      Creates a new PeerGroup allowing you to specify the ClientConnectionManager which is used to create new connections and keep track of existing ones.
      PeerGroup(NetworkParameters params, AbstractBlockChain chain, ClientConnectionManager connectionManager)
      See PeerGroup.PeerGroup(Context, AbstractBlockChain, ClientConnectionManager)

    • Uses of ClientConnectionManager in org.bitcoinj.net

      Classes in org.bitcoinj.net that implement ClientConnectionManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlockingClientManager
      A thin wrapper around a set of BlockingClients.
      class  NioClientManager
      A class which manages a set of client connections.
